Help Click to open\nWhatsApp or WA Business Recent Status Downloaded Status Whatsapp Cleaner Rate Share Privacy More App GIFs Images Videos Document Audio Voice Wallpaper Delete Selected Items (0B) There\'s nothing here! Help
Step 1 Tap on \"Click to open\" icon. Step 2 Click to open Whatsapp or WA Business button. Step 3 First you have to see Status from Whatsapp or WA Business. Step 4 Once you seen status in Whatsapp or WA Business then open this application Your seen status will be here in this app and from here you can Download and Share.
